alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz; Kofa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 2:47PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central La Paz and northeastern Yuma Counties through 415 PM MST... At 246 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Vicksburg Junction, or 43 miles west of Tonopah, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salome, Vicksburg, Vicksburg Junction and Harcuvar. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 42 and 65. US Highway 60 between mile markers 43 and 56. AZ Route 72 between mile markers 43 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
